Biography

2019: Hart Simpson saw time in the Johnson C. Smith contest…Wingate won 10 games for the first time in school history…The Bulldogs earned their third consecutive NCAA playoff berth as well…

2018: Simpson saw action in the Mars Hill game…The Bulldogs won an NCAA playoff game at West Georgia…

2017: Simpson did not play…The Navy Blue and Vegas Gold-clad Bulldogs won the South Atlantic Conference championship in 2017…

2016: Simpson utilized a redshirt season…

Personal: Hart Simpson was a two-year letter winner for the AHS Cougars. He played his senior year for Apex head coach Robert Graham. Simpson finished his senior year with 17 catches for 298 yards and two touchdowns. He received academic all-conference team recognition and player of the week laurels during his senior campaign. Hart is the son of Kevin and Kelley Simpson.

Full name is Kevin Hartford Simpson

Born on August 19, 1997

Born in Charlotte, North Carolina

Son of Kevin and Kelley Simpson

Majoring in Human Services

Favorite Athlete is Eli Manning

Favorite sports team is New York Giants

Favorite movie is Avengers

Favorite TV show is Lost

Favorite musical artist is Kenny Chesney

Favorite food is barbecue

Most memorable sports moment is winning SAC sophomore year

Favorite sport to play other than football is volleyball

Person I admire the most is my mom

Something people don’t know about me is I'm left-handed

Nickname: Hart

Favorite Quote: "Do or do not; there is no try."
